summary: An ordinance amending Sections 951 and 952 of Ordinance No. 31578, entitled: "An ordinance constituting the building code of the City of Seattle, relating to and regulating the construction, alteration, repair, use and occupation of buildings and structures, providing penalties for violation, and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict herewith", approved July 22, 1913, for the purpose of further regulating the construction of waterfront buildings.
